data.name: MENOS: PRECURSOR
data.detailed_description:
Check out the previous title MENOS: PSI-SHATTER

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1602350/MENOS_PSISHATTER/


About the Game

Two years ago, Doctor Evan Patrick lost a part of himself to a Black Hole experiment gone wrong. His mind shattered, something came out of the void to put the pieces back together. Now hunted by the corporation that funded his research, Evan must use his powers to survive and bury the darkness that he found forever.

MENOS returns for an all action, third person sequel. Harness the power of Telekinesis and gunplay in fast paced, physics based combat against overwhelming odds. Throw enemies, stop bullets, pickup guns from afar. Anything that isn't bolted to the ground can be used as a weapon.

FEATURES:

-A high speed third-person shooter with physics based Telekinesis combat.

-Switch up your shooting style with an eclectic range of weapons drawn from fallen enemies to stay in the fight.

-Lift massive objects with your mind. If it moves, you can pick it up and throw it.

Throw enemies, stop bullets, pickup guns from afar. Anything that isn't bolted to the ground can be used as a weapon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD FX 4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660/1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 AMD | For Ray Tracing: GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
